product_overview: Beauty OS is an all-in-one SaaS platform to manage salons and barbershops, providing scheduling, queue management, CRM, finance and marketing tools with high-quality visual themes. It supports public booking and real-time queue status while offering an admin dashboard and staff workflows.
core_goals: Provide a mobile-first, visually differentiated SaaS for salons and barbershops (Beauty and Barber themes).
Streamline operations: scheduling, queue management, client CRM and finance in a single product.
Enable public booking and real-time queue status for end customers without requiring login.
Secure multi-tenant data isolation and simple onboarding for new establishments.
Deliver actionable insights and reports to help owners optimize revenue and staffing.

features.name: User Login
features.description: Allow staff and owners to authenticate with email and password to access protected areas (dashboard, agenda, management pages).
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Login button to submit -> See dashboard at /
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Login button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Register a new establishment account and start the onboarding wizard.
user_flows: Navigate to /register -> Fill business name input field -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Register button -> Redirect to /onboarding
Navigate to /register -> Fill fields with an already-registered email -> Click Register button -> See error message about existing account

features.name: Forgot Password
features.description: Send a password reset link to a user's email to recover account access.
user_flows: Navigate to /forgot-password -> Fill email input field -> Click Send reset link button -> See confirmation message instructing to check email
Navigate to /forgot-password -> Fill email input field with unregistered email -> Click Send reset link button -> See error message 'email not found'

features.name: Update Password (Reset Flow)
features.description: Allow users arriving from a password reset link to set a new password.
user_flows: Navigate to /update-password -> Fill new password field -> Fill confirm password field -> Click Update Password button -> See confirmation and redirect to /login
Navigate to /update-password -> Fill new password field -> Fill confirm password field with a different value -> Click Update Password button -> See validation error 'passwords do not match'

features.name: Public Booking (Client)
features.description: Public-facing booking page where clients can select a professional, service, date and time without logging in.
user_flows: Navigate to /book/:slug -> Select service -> Select date -> Select time slot -> Fill client name input field -> Fill phone or email input field -> Click Confirm Booking -> See booking confirmation message
Navigate to /book/:slug -> Select service -> Select date -> Select an unavailable time slot -> Click Confirm Booking -> See error 'time slot unavailable'

features.name: Queue Join (Public)
features.description: Public queue join page to enter a waiting list for walk-in service.
user_flows: Navigate to /queue/:slug -> Click Join Queue button -> Fill name input field -> Fill phone input field -> Click Confirm Join -> See queue position and redirect to /queue-status/:id
Navigate to /queue/:slug -> Click Join Queue button when queue is closed or full -> Fill details -> Click Confirm Join -> See error 'queue closed or full'

features.name: Queue Status (Public)
features.description: Real-time queue status page where clients can track their position and estimated wait.
user_flows: Navigate to /queue-status/:id -> See current queue position and estimated wait -> Receive real-time updates as position changes -> See 'Now serving' status when at front
Navigate to /queue-status/:invalid -> See error message 'queue not found' or invalid link

features.name: Professional Portfolio (Public)
features.description: Public profile page for a professional showing services, pricing and availability with a CTA to book.
user_flows: Navigate to /pro/:slug -> View professional services list and availability -> Click Book on a service -> Navigate to /book/:slug
Navigate to /pro/:slug where profile does not exist -> See error 'profile not found'

features.name: Onboarding Wizard (Admin)
features.description: Guided setup for new establishments to configure business details, staff and opening hours.
user_flows: Navigate to /onboarding (authenticated) -> Fill business name input field -> Upload logo -> Configure opening hours -> Click Complete Setup -> Redirect to /
Navigate to /onboarding (authenticated) -> Leave a required field empty -> Click Next or Complete -> See validation error indicating the missing field

features.name: Dashboard (Admin)
features.description: Admin home showing KPIs, upcoming appointments and quick navigation to core areas (agenda, clients, finance).
user_flows: Navigate to / (authenticated) -> See KPI cards and upcoming appointments -> Click Agenda link or button -> Navigate to /agenda
Navigate to / (unauthenticated) -> Be redirected to /login

features.name: Agenda (Staff)
features.description: Daily/weekly schedule for staff to view and manage appointments, mark services complete and open appointment details.
user_flows: Navigate to /agenda (authenticated) -> View daily schedule -> Click an appointment -> Click Mark as Completed -> See appointment status changed to completed
Navigate to /agenda (authenticated) -> Attempt to edit an appointment outside allowed permissions -> See permission denied error

features.name: Queue Management (Admin/Fila)
features.description: Internal interface to manage the waiting list: call next, move clients between statuses and monitor in-service clients.
user_flows: Navigate to /fila (authenticated) -> See current queue list -> Select a client -> Click Move to 'In Service' -> See client status updated in the queue
Navigate to /fila (authenticated) -> Try to perform queue action without adequate permissions -> See permission denied error

features.name: Clients List
features.description: List and search of all clients with quick access to client CRM details.
user_flows: Navigate to /clientes (authenticated) -> See clients list -> Click a client entry -> Navigate to /clientes/:id
Navigate to /clientes (authenticated) -> See no clients -> See empty state with a CTA to add a client or import

features.name: Client CRM (Client Details)
features.description: Detailed client page showing contact info, visit history, notes and the ability to add CRM entries.
user_flows: Navigate to /clientes/:id (authenticated) -> View client contact and visit timeline -> Click Add Note -> Fill note field -> Click Save -> See note appear in timeline
Navigate to /clientes/:invalid (authenticated) -> See error 'client not found'

features.name: Finance (Financeiro)
features.description: Financial overview including daily cash flow, revenue by professional and exportable reports.
user_flows: Navigate to /financeiro (authenticated) -> See cash flow summary and revenue charts -> Click Export Report -> Receive downloadable CSV or confirmation
Navigate to /financeiro (authenticated) -> Click Export Report while backend fails -> See error 'export failed, try again later'

features.name: Marketing
features.description: Create and schedule marketing campaigns (email/WhatsApp) and visual materials using templates.
user_flows: Navigate to /marketing (authenticated) -> Click Create Campaign -> Fill campaign name and message -> Click Schedule -> See campaign scheduled confirmation
Navigate to /marketing (authenticated) -> Click Create Campaign -> Leave required campaign fields empty -> Click Schedule -> See validation error about required fields

features.name: Reports & Insights (Admin)
features.description: KPI dashboards and exportable insights to monitor business performance (faturamento, ticket médio, ocupação).
user_flows: Navigate to /insights (authenticated) -> View KPI cards and interactive charts -> Apply date filter -> See charts update to selected range
Navigate to /insights (authenticated) -> Apply a very large date range -> See loading indicator then an error 'data load failed' if timeout occurs
